meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>halt</kanji> <kanji>electricity</kanji> you experience a <vocabulary>power outage</vocabulary>. Makes sense. When the electricity stops you don't have any more power.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
